title: Huge NWO PLOT to Control Brains: SARS-Cov-2 by Fauci, Graphene by Darpa-Obama, Vaccines by Gates-Biden-EU | VT Foreign Policy
cleaned_text:

1 – IN MEMORY OF FRANCO TRINCA AND DOMENICO BISCARDI

This investigation is dedicated to the Italians biologist Franco Trinca and the pharmacologist Domenico Biscardi who died mysteriously and suddenly a few weeks after their mysterious lunch to talk about graphene: the biologist for a very suspicious and lethal Covid-19 really similar to a bacteriological weapon such as SARS- Cov-2 built in the laboratory; the pharmacologist for a heart attack similar to those triggered by the toxic Spike protein of that Covid-19 to which he actually tested positive “post mortem”.

Trinca was a rigorous scientist, dedicated to polemics against the ignorance of the scientific community, especially the Italian one, regarding published research on the dangerousness of experimental anti-Covid gene serums which referred to great virologists such as Luc Montagnier and Geert Vanden Bossche, both manufacturers of traditional vaccines.

Biscardi was good-natured, pleasant, affable, forthright and in good faith even when perhaps he argued about one too many chemical trails. And although it was the antithesis of a credible scientist, it has made a now reliable discovery become more viral than Omicron on social media, such as the very probable presence of graphene in experimental gene serums that the health dictatorship imposed by a “mafia culture” policy calls messenger RNA vaccines against Covid-19.

But it would be right to also add “vaccines for Covid”: in deference to all those who took it after the viral discharges of Spike toxic protein from the first, second or third dose of inoculation of the substance with immunizing claims.

Graphene is a sheet of carbon atoms tightly bound together and arranged to form a hexagonal honeycomb structure. This particular arrangement of the carbon atoms (which are all equal to each other) gives the material particular characteristics: graphene is flexible, light, transparent and at the same time the most resistant material known. In addition, graphene is a highly conductive material and therefore of interest for a number of applications: from flexible electronic devices to medicine and, indeed, neuroscience.

I haven’t seen Mimmo’s video, I don’t intend to see it because I still couldn’t cite a pharmacologist who has never published a research. But stimulated by its apparent certainties, I have delved into this topic with cynical skepticism and since then I have carried out no less than three surveys with the unequivocal title “Vaccines & Graphene” in which I analyse, through scientific publications, the mysterious and dangerous lipid nanoparticles that have become miraculous carriers of mRNA serums.

The Comirnaty Safety Sheet, Pfizer and Biontech’s anti-Covid vaccine, refers to a biotechnology with a still unknown toxicity: “The toxicological properties have not been studied in depth” reads the Pfizer document updated to December 7, 2021.

Gospa News readers know for sure that lipid nanoparticles are mixed with the ALC-0315 adjuvant inside Comirnaty, the only vaccine also authorized for children aged 5 and over to the delight of friends Joseph Biden, president of the United States of Big Pharma, Albert Bourla (CEO of Pfizer) and Bill Gates (investor of Biontech and GSK partner of Pfizer).

This was stated by Theresa Long in an affidavit as a whistleblower under the Military Whistleblower Protection Act, Title 10 U.S.C. § 1034. Dr. Long is a lieutenant colonel in the US Air Force as well as a surgeon in charge of the 1st Aviation Brigade at Fort Rucker in Alabama.

It is military doctor Long who claims that those lipid nanoparticles and in particular the ALC-0315 adjuvant are highly toxic to humans: she recalls that it is a polymer very similar to car antifreeze liquid… Is that enough?

We are equally sure that from up there Trinca and Biscardi will appreciate the homage “to graphene” that we want to pay them as an epitaph of two researchers of the Third Millennium: perfectly capable of competing with the mystified science of the mainstream that has been profaned on the altar of political-economic power from popularizers who are a little low in moral stature and a little prankster in Stalinist chirps…

This is sufficient, for those who do not want to read evidence, clues and intrigues between scientists, 007 of the CIA, Chinese Communists of the Shanghai China Gang and American Democrats of the Clinton nursery, narrated by the cycle of investigations Wuhan-Gates from 1 to 48, but summarized above all in the reportages n. 4, 8, 9, 26, 31, 39, 40, 41,43, 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 51, 52, 56, 58 and 59.

DARPA (Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency) is the agency of the Pentagon, the US Department of Defense, specialized in military projects so extreme as to appear science fiction like the crazy study that talks about graphene in relation to the brain.

«The White House announced the BRAIN initiative in April 2013 (Obama-Biden administration – ed). Today, the initiative is supported by several federal agencies as well as dozens of technology firms, academic institutions, scientists and other key contributors to the field of neuroscience. DARPA is supporting the BRAIN initiative through a number of programs, continuing a legacy of DARPA investment in neurotechnology that extends back to the 1970s. An article in our 60th anniversary magazine provides an overview of the agency’s recent research aimed at expanding the frontiers of the field and enabling powerful, new capabilities».

Given the delicacy and complexity of the topic, we limit ourselves to copying and pasting the salient parts of the “DARPA and the Brain Initiative” project.

«The ElectRx program aims to help the human body heal itself through neuromodulation of organ functions using ultraminiaturized devices, approximately the size of individual nerve fibers, which could be delivered through minimally invasive injection».
• Work Begins to Support Self-Healing of Body and Mind
• ElectRx Has the Nerve to Envision Revolutionary Therapies for Self-Healing
• President Obama Highlights New DARPA Program Aimed at Developing Novel Therapies Customized to Individual Patients

But what interests us with the title “Reliable neural interface technology (RE-NET)” is found in one of the entries of another research which would then be “archived” or passed on to some Pentagon contractor who works in one of the 25 biological laboratories of the Defense Threat Reduction Agency scattered above all in the countries of the former Soviet Union which under the aegis of the CIA develop biological weapons?

We recall, for example, that among the subcontractors of the Pentagon there are various pharmaceutical companies including Metabiota, founded by Hunter Biden, GlaxoSmithKline, administered by a director of Microsoft and partner of Pfizer, and Gilead, financed by George Soros and producer of the antiviral Remdesivir, but above all known for lethal biological activities conducted with contributions from the US government in the Richard Lugar Center in Tbilisi, Georgia, inaugurated in 2011 by President Obama, sponsored in his electoral race by megadonor Bill Gates who financed the dangerous research in Wuhan through Eco Health Alliance, the New York NGO chaired by Peter Daszak.

«The RE-NET program seeks to develop the technologies needed to reliably extract information from the nervous system, and to do so at a scale and rate necessary to control complex machines, such as high-performance prosthetic limbs».
• Atom-width Graphene Sensors Could Provide Unprecedented Insights into Brain Structure and Function

«Understanding the anatomical structure and function of the brain is a longstanding goal in neuroscience and a top priority of President Obama’s brain initiative. Electrical monitoring and stimulation of neuronal signaling is a mainstay technique for studying brain function, while emerging optical techniques—which use photons instead of electrons—are opening new opportunities for visualizing neural network structure and exploring brain functions. Electrical and optical techniques offer distinct and complementary advantages that, if used together, could offer profound benefits for studying the brain at high resolution. Combining these technologies is challenging, however, because conventional metal electrode technologies are too thick (>500 nm) to be transparent to light, making them incompatible with many optical approaches».

Readers have patience but the topic is so innovative as to require an almost complete publication of the text taken from the official link of the Pentagon military agency.

«To help overcome these challenges, DARPA has created a proof-of-concept tool that demonstrates much smaller, transparent contacts that can measure and stimulate neural tissue using electrical and optical methods at the same time. Researchers at the University of Wisconsin at Madison developed the new technology with support from DARPA’s Reliable Neural-Interface Technology (RE-NET) program. It is described in detail in a paper in Nature Communications (http://www.nature.com/articles/ncomms6258)».

«This technology demonstrates potentially breakthrough capabilities for visualizing and quantifying neural network activity in the brain» said Doug Weber, head of the DARPA program, the same agency that is developing the microchip under the skin to detect the contagion from Covid-19 and which years ago rejected a military bacteriological experiment by Fauci because it was considered too dangerous. But another mysterious one was funded in UK…

«The ability to simultaneously measure electrical activity on a large and fast scale with direct visualization and modulation of neuronal network anatomy could provide unprecedented insight into relationships between brain structure and function—and importantly, how these relationships evolve over time or are perturbed by injury or disease».

«The new device uses graphene, a recently discovered form of carbon, on a flexible plastic backing that conforms to the shape of tissue. The graphene sensors are electrically conductive but only 4 atoms thick—less than 1 nanometer and hundreds of times thinner than current contacts. Its extreme thinness enables nearly all light to pass through across a wide range of wavelengths. Moreover, graphene is nontoxic to biological systems, an improvement over previous research into transparent electrical contacts that are much thicker, rigid, difficult to manufacture and reliant on potentially toxic metal alloys».

«The technology demonstration draws upon three cutting-edge research fields: graphene, which earned researchers the 2010 Nobel Prize in Physics; super-resolved fluorescent microscopy, which earned researchers the 2014 Nobel Prize in Chemistry; and optogenetics, which involves genetically modifying cells to create specific light-reactive proteins» DARPA added.

This ties in with another fantascientific project that became reality at Darpa Labs: “DragonflEye is a genetically engineered dragonfly with light-sensitive ‘steering neurons’ implanted in its spinal cord. Insects equipped with a custom backpack filled with sensors can be controlled, but it’s still under development. Flashes of light are used to make insects fly or move.”

But it has now been surpassed by Micro Air Vehicles (MAV), very small autonomous robotic drones also called Nano-Bugs because they have the size and shape of insects, in order to be used for military espionage without being detected.

This is why cyber-dragonflies could also have been used as “guinea pigs” for subsequent possible uses of “optogenetics” to remotely control mammals. And maybe even the man…

DARPA explained in its project: «RE-NET seeks to develop new tools and technologies to understand and overcome the failure mechanisms of neural interfaces. DARPA is interested in advancing next-generation neurotechnologies for revealing the relationship between neural network structure and function. RE-NET, and subsequent DARPA programs in this field, plan to leverage this new tool by simultaneously measuring the function, physical motion and behavior of neurons in freely moving subjects».

«This technology provides the capability to modulate neural function, by applying programmed pulses of electricity or light to temporarily activate neurons. Therefore, it could not only provide better observation of native functionality but also, through careful modulation of circuit activity, enable exploration of causal relationships between neural signals and brain function».

“Historically, researchers have been limited to correlational studies that suggest, but do not prove causal linkages between neural activity and behavior,” Weber said. “Now, we have the opportunity to directly see, measure and stimulate neural circuits to explore these relationships and develop and validate models of brain circuit function. This knowledge could greatly aid how we understand and treat brain injury and disease.”

«RE-NET is part of a broader portfolio of programs within DARPA that support President Obama’s brain initiative. These programs include ongoing efforts designed to advance fundamental understanding of the brain’s dynamics to drive applications (Revolutionizing Prosthetics, Restorative Encoding Memory Integration Neural Device, Reorganization and Plasticity to Accelerate Injury Recovery, Enabling Stress Resistance), manufacture sensing systems for neuroscience applications and therapies (Hand Proprioception & Touch Interfaces, Electrical Prescriptions) and analyze large data sets (Detection and Computational Analysis of Psychological Signals).

7 – IN EUROPE STUDIES ON GRAPHENE FLAKES IN THE BRAIN

“Tiny ‘flakes’ made with the wonder material, graphene, can control brain activity by interfering with the signal transmission of excitatory neurons that activate other neurons” wrote ANSA, the most important Italian press agency, in an article dated May 13, 2019, confirming the applications dreamed by Obama.

These nanomaterials, selective, safe and with a reversible effect, will be able to open new scenarios in the search for therapies against neurological diseases such as epilepsy. This is indicated by the study published in the journal Nano Letters by the International School for Advanced Studies (SISSA) of Trieste, conducted in collaboration with the universities of Trieste, Manchester and Strasbourg as part of the European initiative Graphene Flagship.

This billionaire project launched by the European Commission is part of the Horizon 2020 plan and has also financed other research in the biomedical field including that of Dr. Lucia Gemma Delogu, a young Sardinian scientist from the Department of Biomedical Sciences of the University of Padua, who has become the world reference point of the medical and pharmacological applications of the carbon derivative within the Graphene Flagship.

It was she, together with other colleagues, who published a research in the summer of 2020 aimed at experimenting with the use of graphene within the anti-Covid gene serums, as we will see in the next paragraphs.

SISSA researchers led by Laura Ballerini demonstrated this by injecting graphene flakes (100-200 millionths of a millimeter large) into a specific area of the brain, the hippocampus.

“Thanks to fluorescent tracers we have seen that the particles selectively insinuate themselves into the synapses of excitatory neurons and they do so with a reversible effect after 72 hours”, explains Ballerini together with researcher Rossana Rauti.

The interest of the procedure also lies in the fact that the flakes are well tolerated by the body: this could give impetus to new research aimed at investigating their use as ‘ships’ for the targeted transport of drugs or as a tool for treating diseases such as l epilepsy in which there is an excess of excitatory neuron activity.

But as the DARPA study highlighted they can also be used for “electrical prescriptions” or “applying programmed pulses of electricity or light to temporarily activate neurons.”

“Amino-functionalized graphene oxide (GO-NH2) induces the activation of interferon STAT1/IRF1 signaling in monocytes and T lymphocytes, resulting in the production of T lymphocyte chemoattractants and macrophage 1 (M1) 1/ T-helper 1 (Th1) and polarization of the immune response, with negligible toxicity»
